words.sentence: Ik heb studiestress en veel dagen.
words.sentence_translated: I have study stress and many days.

words.sentence: Ik luisteren naar de radio en vergeten niets.
words.sentence_translated: I listen to the radio and forget nothing.
The most interesting books are fun.

words.sentence: Ik luisteren bewust naar de radio.
words.sentence_translated: I listen to the radio consciously.

words.sentence: Het boek is onder de kast.
words.sentence_translated: The book is under the cupboard.

words.sentence: Ik heb studiestress omdat ik vergeten ben.
words.sentence_translated: I have study stress because I forgot.
My brother also has study stress.

words.sentence: Ik wil de touch niet vergeten.
words.sentence_translated: I want to not forget the touch.
